fix: replace Celery with lightweight in-process task runner

- Update collection endpoints to use task runner instead of Celery
- Fix route prefixes: all collection endpoints under /v1/collection/
- Remove celery dependency from requirements.txt

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
